```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
```

The **scscuildr** aims to provide example codes in support of a presentation for the Statistical Computing Series hosted by the Department of Biostatistics, Vanderbilt University Medical Center.

## Installation

You can install the **scsbuildr** package from GitHub with:

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("panpanzhang99299/scsbuildr")
```
